welcome_message_body: Welcome to Nagareyama, Japan! This charming city is known for its beautiful cherry blossoms, traditional tea houses, and serene parks. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Nagareyama has to offer.

restaurants.name: Yamaokaya (ラーメン山岡家)
